mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_SZBSI_BKS( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, LOAN_COUNT, LOAN_NOT_SQUARE_COUNT, LOAN_AMOUNT, LOAN_BALANCE_AMOUNT, LOAN_ARREAR_AMOUNT, LOAN_HISTORY_ARREAR_TIMES, CREDITCARD_COUNT, CREDITCARD_USING_COUNT, CP_OVERDRAFT_AMOUNT, CREDITCARD_OVERDRAFT_AMOUNT, CREDITCARD_FIRST_OPEN, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{loanCount}, #{loanNotSquareCount}, #{loanAmount}, #{loanBalanceAmount}, #{loanArrearAmount}, #{loanHistoryArrearTimes}, #{creditcardCount}, #{creditcardUsingCount}, #{cpOverdraftAmount}, #{creditcardOverdraftAmount}, #{creditcardFirstOpen}, #{appId} )
